Articles.Content:
My attempt at making Skylab will be here and i will update as i go..

*Update*

The ATM is pretty much done and I\'m going to Work on the main module now.

*Update*

Main module almost done, Im about to start working on the struts to hold the ATM to the docking module

*Update*

Most big pieces are done and now it just needs little details.

Thats a nice array you got there. That\'s one of the four coming off the ATM right?

This will look hilarious on top of a rocket.

Keep up the good work!

It looks like a lasagna noodle.

Thats not helpful. >
Well, at first it did. Now it\'s starting to look like skylab! The cylindrical part is kinda low poly though. The standard in KSP is 24 sides.
looking good man! for parts of 1m diameter i use 20 faces, and always use smooth groups in max; that will do. =)

looking good man! for parts of 1m diameter i use 20 faces, and always use smooth groups in max; that will do. =)

But but but but, inconsistent with the rest of the game!
Can\'t wait for this! I used an imported model of skylab from nasa\'s repository for a while. Will this be in separate pieces?

Are you going to make things like the Apollo telescope mount?

Also, will it have a second lateral solar panel like skylab was intended (only one could be deployed properly)

Are you going to make things like the Apollo telescope mount?

I might.

Also, will it have a second lateral solar panel like skylab was intended (only one could be deployed properly)

Yes.

This is the picture im using as a reference http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Skylab_illustration.jpg

I might.

Yes.

This is the picture im using as a reference http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Skylab_illustration.jpg

The little struts along the solar panels should have their height variance reduced a lot. Make them similar to the height variance of the panels themselves.

Err... http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Skylab_4_undocking.jpg

Mine are close enough to correct and I dont wanna redo all of them

Wow!!

Is it going to come with a broken solar array just the the real thing?

And a Solar Shield to be deployed by the kerbals?

And a fridge?

And a Shower no one used?

and a solar telescope mount?
That was posted in early-mid November. I doubt it\'s still being worked on.

WOW

[gmod]Please do not bump old threads or make one word posts. I suggest you read our Forum Rules.

This topic is being locked as the OP has been banned.[/gmod]

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
